wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2011-01-27：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2011-01-27：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： DNS服务器任意列取DNS记录。DNS服务器映射到dns.sohu-inc.com，顺便看了一下搜狐自己DNS却是sohu.com域的，没有此漏洞 详细说明：  wg365.com.              1       IN      NS      dns.sohu-inc.com.wg365.com.              1       IN      MX      0 mx.mail.sohu.net.wg365.com.              1       IN      MX      10 mx.mail.sohu.net.wg365.com.              1       IN      A       117.79.224.241admin.wg365.com.        1       IN      A       117.79.224.241alipay.wg365.com.       1       IN      CNAME   362806.alipayeshop.com.bbs.wg365.com.          1       IN      A       117.79.224.242bg.wg365.com.           1       IN      A       117.79.224.242cul.wg365.com.          1       IN      A       117.79.224.242go.wg365.com.           1       IN      A       117.79.224.241img.wg365.com.          1       IN      A       117.79.224.242lady.wg365.com.         1       IN      A       117.79.224.242life.wg365.com.         1       IN      A       117.79.224.242mail.wg365.com.         1       IN      A       117.79.224.242S.wg365.com.            1       IN      A       117.79.224.241search.wg365.com.       1       IN      A       117.79.224.241shop.wg365.com.         1       IN      A       117.79.224.241tech.wg365.com.         1       IN      A       117.79.224.242tupian.wg365.com.       1       IN      A       117.79.224.242tx.wg365.com.           1       IN      A       117.79.224.242waves.wg365.com.        1       IN      A       117.79.224.241www.wg365.com.          1       IN      A       117.79.224.241zixun.wg365.com.        1       IN      A       117.79.224.242   漏洞证明：  见细节说明   修复方案：  你知道的   版权声明：转载请注明来源 F.One.S@乌云
